title: True newes from Ireland, sent in a letter to a friend at the Meare-maide in Cheap-side.
author: Fletcher, Robert, with the Army at Dublin.
publisher: Printed for I. Bull living in Grubstreet,
notes: Dated and signed at bottom of text: Your loving friend, Robert Fletcher. From Dublin Castle the 28. of March. 1642.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
